name: Things on Strings
description:
Things on Strings is a local party game for 4 players. Challenge your friends to a competition of ridiculous mini-games!

Things on Strings is a local party game for 4 players.

Each player controls just one half of a puppet. Together with your teammate you have to act faster than the other team to win: communication is the key to victory.

Challenge your friends to best-of-three competition of ridiculous mini-games in three different scenarios.

The mumbling audience is waiting.

Now the Curtain rises and the show begins.

Coming to PC in 2016.

Team

Melina Cornelius - GD/ Junior Production

Lisa Frommert - Art

Constantin Copony - Art

Michael Oelke - Development

Darius Penner - Game Design / Production

Markus Zierhofer - Music
